fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: EU agricultural policy (CAP), Animal health and welfare, Environmental policies, Climate change,
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Finnish Beekeepers´ Association is the roof organization of local beekeeping associations in Finland. Our main goals are: 1) developing profitable professional beekeeping as well as beekeeping as a hobby, 2) securing the pollination needs of insect-pollinated crops in Finland and 3) informing the general public about honeybees, other bees (including their importance as pollinators and conservation) and bee products.
